lines.text: Remember how I taught you after a shower to shake the water off your head like a dog?
Well, Grandpa taught me that and some day you'll teach your kid that.

[Trying to hit Jesse with an axe]
If thy eye offends thee... pluck it out! If thy hand offends thee... cut it off!
I've collected two of every creature on earth what more do you want? I am ready... let the rains come down
The prophecy is complete! One male... one female! The prophecy shall continue on!
